snippet.title: Interview about MagicCraft with Igor Kovalev from Devoted Studios || MagicCraftGame
snippet.description:
Hi MagicCrafters! In this video Igor Kovalev from Devoted Studios answers the most important questions about the MagicCraftGame. You will find out about the process of building the MagicCraft narrative, the place where the whole MagicCraft game takes place. You'll see the process of game creation, learn how the collaboration within the art team goes & which exciting updates to expect soon!

🔮MagicCraft NFT Marketplace: https://marketplace.magiccraft.io 

🎮PLAY-TO-EARN CROSS-PLATFORM FANTASY WORLD MMORPG: https://magiccraft.io
💰STAKE $MCRT: https://app.magiccraft.io/

🐦TWITTER: https://twitter.com/MagicCraftGame
👾DISCORD: https://discord.gg/c4bgnsqzQR
📬TELEGRAM: https://t.me/magiccraftgamechat

📷INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/magiccraftgame
📱TikTok: https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMLPBTAp5/

💰COINMARKETCAP: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/magiccraft/

🔮Enjoy MagicCraftGame metaverse: https://rebrand.ly/MagicCraftGameMetaverse

MagicCraft is one of the top PlayToEarn games 2022. MagicCraft Game is a massive war and conquest multiplayer crypto game launched on Binance Smart Chain, with an advanced guild system, taxes, and economy. You team up with other players and build clans to fight other clans on the platform.

In the MagicCraft world, there are powerful castles built by the elders. Every week your clan needs to show its valor and fight with other players’ clans to conquer and gain ownership of one of the 7 castles, where the King of the castle receives their taxation.

Emerge victorious among other clans, and then collect taxes in our native cryptocurrency known as $MCRT.

Each character has different traits, items, weapons, armor, spells, magic scrolls, clothes, attacks, and poses. You can collect these characters as you level up your game. You are free to trade these collectibles in the NFT marketplace as well in exchange for $MCRT.

00:00 Introduction
00:10 Building the narrative of MagicCraft
00:35 World of MagicCraftGame
01:23 Creative process
01:58 Project's pipeline
02:30 Art team performance
03:54 Updates for MagicCraft
